request.description:
Get all voucher that is claimable
voucher discount type
1: percentage
2: fixed amount
3: buy x free y
voucher type
1: public voucher
2: points redeemable
3: register reward
user_voucher (retrieve user's voucher)

2: false
expired_only (retrieve user's expired voucher)
1: true
